DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Cancer Patients ' Satisfaction With Hospital Quality Care
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine scale structure , reliability , validity QLQ-SAT32 patient satisfaction module assess perception quality care receive hospital patient cancer . - Determine success QLQ-SAT32 patient satisfaction module use QLQ-C30 core quality life questionnaire , term expand quality life evaluation provide information treatment acceptability preference patient . OUTLINE : This descriptive , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord age ( 18 49 v 50 ) cancer therapy receive hospital ( surgery v chemotherapy ) . Patients strata receive QLQ-SAT32 QLQ-C30 questionnaire , debrief questionnaire , Oberst patient satisfaction visual analog scale prior hospital discharge . Patients complete material home within 7 day discharge . A group 100 patient repeat QLQ-SAT32 module mail complete within 7 day receipt first questionnaire . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 640-768 patient ( 160-192 per stratum ) accrue study .
